alert.note: Alert for Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:23AM CST until January 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain possible. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. Very cold wind chills as low as 10 to 15 degrees. * WHERE...Assumption, St. James, St. John The Baptist, Upper Lafourche and Upper Terrebonne Parishes. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM CST Tuesday. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sidewalks and roads, particularly bridges, overpasses, and lesser traveled secondary roads, may become slippery. The hazardous conditions could impact the commute overnight and Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of rain, light freezing rain and freezing drizzle is currently moving across this area this morning. Precipitation ends from west to east not too long after sunrise this morning, but remaining water on roads freezing icy roads are likely to continue into the morning commute as any remaining water on roads could quickly freezing.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
